block_type_intended.Description: Category of the presented block. Text appeared at the beginning of each block to remind the participant of the block type.

Levels.no-go: withold response when target shapes present

block_type_performed.LongName: Block type as performed by participant
block_type_performed.Description: Category of the performed block. Based on subject responses authors categorized the way subjects were performing the block. In long periods of non-response, block was divided into multiple onsets and durations so as to segment out and not include in analysis.

Levels.no-go: withold response when target shapes present
Levels.NR: Period of three or more consecutive non-responses, alternatinmg responses, or random responses indicating inattention to task. Noted in comments.

correct_total.Description: Total number of correct responses within duration period, dictated by the performed block type

errors_total.Description: Total number of errors made within duration period, dictated by the performed block type

false-no_go.Description: Total number of false no-go errors made within duration period. False no-go categorized as a non-response within a go block

false-go.Description: Total number of false go errors made within duration period. False go categorized as a failure to withold a response to target within a no-go block

NR.Description: Total number of non-response errors made within duration period. 2 consecutive non-responses in period requiring response, larger chunks of non-response periods partialed out into other onset and duration sections to be removed from analysis
